personal.name: Dagim Debebe
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in building modern web applications. I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and continuously learning new technologies.

about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. With several years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating scalable, user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.
highlights: Proficient in modern web technologies and frameworks
Passionate about clean code and best practices

projects.title: Car Rental Platform
projects.description: A web-based car rental platform built with Next.js and EspoCRM. It uses Next.js routes to fetch and process EspoCRM APIs, allowing users to browse, book, and manage rentals while admins handle fleet and customer data through EspoCRM.

projects.title: LinkForge
projects.description: A real-time collaborative knowledge canvas blending Obsidian's wiki-linking with Figma's infinite, zoomable UI. Users create color-coded zones on a shared canvas for notes, embeds, and mind maps, ideal for team brainstorming. Actively maintained with ongoing enhancements to collaboration features.

projects.title: Bulls and Cows Multiplayer Game
projects.description: A real-time, web-based implementation of the classic Bulls and Cows number-guessing game. The frontend is built with Svelte, while a Go server manages game sessions, player states, and matchmaking. WebSockets are used for low-latency communication, enabling players to create or join lobbies, challenge opponents, and receive live updates as guesses are made and results are calculated.
